manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us We create world-changing technology that improves the life of every person on the planet. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best budget option with great performance
reviews.reviewText: The CPU price is incredibly cheap (especially if you buy 2nd hand) the performance is exactly half of the 13-10105F and pair well with any mid-high GPU (say GTX 1660 or RX-580) the performance is comparable to 6th gen i5 but with better memory latency, lower TDP and better PCI lanes.the 58w TDP means you can run the stock cooler for general use, but if used in gaming any cheap tower cooler will keep it nice and fresh regardless of the gaming session.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insane Budget Value
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to take this review to directly address those thinking of purchasing for gaming, as I haven't seen too many reviews about this.For the value, this CPU is insanely good, but you must know what kind of games you want to play before you pull the trigger. It is a 2-core, 4-thread CPU which is the equivalent of what older gen i3 CPU's were. It is very snappy for browsing & basic needs, but how does it handle in-game? Here's my experience. I have this paired up with a 4GB R9 380 GPU and 8GB of DDR4 at 2666. Windows 10. Some sample benchmarks:Apex Legends: AVG 65, Low 46 on mix of low/highWitcher III: AVG 71, dips to high 50's in Novigrad, all high with shadows on lowFortnite: AVG 123, Low 76, competitive settingsModern Warfare: 50-60 AVG on mix of settingsNow obviously these are rough samples, and YMMV depending on your GPU and config. You can probably push higher frame-rates with even just a 10th gen i3. However, if you are on a budget, or you don't care much about having the most consistent frames in the world, this CPU is a killer value. I, for one, learned an important lesson with this CPU. Stop caring about the frames, and just enjoy the games. Even still, the performance this CPU can push on a healthy PC build is beyond acceptable. It is not a AAA game crushing chip, but it will play a lot of games from 2015 onwards perfectly fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: PARA TAREAS DE OFIMATICA RECOMIENDO NUNCA PARA GAMING EXCELENTO PRODUCTO Y RENDIMIENTO BASICO RECOMIENDO 10 DE 10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a budget cpu that delivers as long as your needs are not excessive. It functions for Internet browsing and for television viewing on an ASRock motherboard (z590 pro 4) with 16 GB of memory. I upgraded from a sixth generation i5 and I find no lag whatsoever in performance. For the price, it is hard to imagine a better performer. This is a 10th generation cpu and the motherboard accommodates 11th generation processors as well, so down the road an upgrade is possible and maybe even likely. For now, however, this chip sufficiently meets my needs. If your budget is not so robust, or if you prefer to hang onto your money, give this chip serious consideration. I have had other Pentium chips in the past that were good performers, and this one carries on that tradition. Best wishes for satisfying computing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great CPU if you know what you’re looking for!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great low powered CPU for a file server/NAS. I’m using the integrated graphics and it plays back 4K content better than a fourth gen Xeon with a dedicated graphics card! If you buy this CPU with realistic expectations of what it can do, you’ll be thrilled. For under $50, it would be hard to beat. My system runs at 19 watts when the HDD’s aren’t in use, which is quite nice. It’s snappy when opening folders and web browsing, and boot up and shut down times are relatively quick as well. You could probably play some legacy games with this CPU. Again, as long as your expectations are realistic, you will likely be pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: This processor installed and works as advertised, no issues. However it would have been helpful if the seller indicated that it came with a fan, heat sink and thermal paste rather than "Thermal solution NOT included in the box" under product description resulting to my having to return a CPU fan, heat sink and thermal paste. -_-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It came with a stock cooler and packaged within a retail box (not an OEM tray variant).
reviews.reviewText: I'm not one that races out to type a CPU review. There is already plenty of information, benchmarks, etc. on the web detailing the performance of this chip and/or chips that are similar. Ultimately, I'm hoping to present a little clarification regarding what one may expect to receive when purchasing this item.So, if the headline of this review has caught your attention it may have been because you noticed the product description states that it "doesn't" come with a thermal solution (AKA: heat-sink/fan). However, like some other reviewers/commenters have stated, "it does"! (or at least mine did). The item I received was in retail form and included the stock heat-sink and fan (case badge and all). I've come across similar dependencies on other retail sites claiming the same thing. Sad to state, purchasing this item felt like more of a gamble if anything.Does that guarantee the one you purchase will include one...Don't know! But it may minimize the reluctance to purchase it seeing that myself, including others, have had the same experience and can confirm that the item received was indeed a retail variant.All in all, if it comes down to it, it is a relativity inexpensive chip. Even though potentially receiving one without a thermal solution may not be all that desirable, many aftermarket solutions can be found on the web and are rather cost effective when dealing with a chip of this type. So, the $10 or less region may not be out of line for an adequate thermal solution. Just think of your possible usage scenarios and buy accordingly (if it would even come to that).I bought this knowing it may not have come with a cooler, so I can't state I would've felt burned getting one without one. "5 Stars" for exceeding my expectations!Best of luck!

reviews.reviewTitle: great basic processor for new build!
reviews.reviewText: excellent for basic home or office computer. fast shipping. excellent price. built in graphics...no need for expensive graphics card. very easy to install! cooling unit and paste included. well packaged.
Gosto deste produto, ótima alternativa para quem não tem muito para investir e quer um processador rápido, robusto e que não queira depender de uma placa de vídeo para jogos mais leves.
el producto es de mala calidad
Es un buen procesador relación calidad precio, se debe entender que no es para juegos pesados, para oficina funciona mas que excelente y para juegos ligeros es muy bueno.

J'ai choisi ce processeur pour l'assemblage d'un NAS DIY sachant qu'il présente à mon avis un des meilleurs rapports performance / prix pour ce type de projet.En définitive il s'avère efficace pour l'utilisation visée, et -qui plus est- silencieux avec son ventirad d'origine sans même chauffer véritablement.Je recommande donc ;-)
